dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7082 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2200 North George Mason Drive in Arlington, Virginia, as the “Jesus Antonio Collazos Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2200 North George Mason Drive in Arlington, Virginia, as the Jesus Antonio Collazos Post Office Building.

section.header: Jesus Antonio Collazos Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2200 North George Mason Drive in Arlington, Virginia, shall be known and designated as the Jesus Antonio Collazos Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Jesus Antonio Collazos Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 12, 2022.
